A Blocks / JavaScript code editor for th: A Blocks / JavaScript code editor for the micro:bit powered by Microsoft MakeCode.
Adds new blocks for message communicatio: Adds new blocks for message communication in the radio category
BETA - Camera, remote control and other: BETA -  Camera, remote control and other Bluetooth services. App required.
Check your firmware version here and upd: Check your firmware version here and update if needed
Click 'Pair device' below and select BBC: Click 'Pair device' below and select BBC micro:bit CMSIS-DAP or DAPLink CMSIS-DAP from the list
Comic moving hex file to micro:bit: Comic moving hex file to micro:bit
Connect the {0} to your computer with a: Connect the {0} to your computer with a USB cable
Importing microbit.co.uk programs is not: Importing microbit.co.uk programs is not supported in this editor anymore. Please open this script in the https://makecode.microbit.org/v0 editor.
JustWorks pairing (default): Pairing is: JustWorks pairing (default): Pairing is automatic once the pairing is initiated.
Locate the downloaded .hex file and drag: Locate the downloaded .hex file and drag it to the {0} drive
No Pairing Required: Anyone can connect: No Pairing Required: Anyone can connect via Bluetooth.
One-click download took too long. Please: One-click download took too long. Please disconnect your {0} from your computer and reconnect it, then manually download your program using drag and drop.
Passkey pairing: Pairing requires 6 digi: Passkey pairing: Pairing requires 6 digit key to pair.
Please manually download your program to: Please manually download your program to your device using drag and drop. One-click download might work afterwards.
Use the microUSB port on the top of the: Use the microUSB port on the top of the {0}
You must have version 0249 or above of t: You must have version 0249 or above of the firmware
